Class CriteriaBasedFilter

java.lang.Object
CriteriaBasedFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICriteriaFilter, IInternshipSorter
public class CriteriaBasedFilter extends Object implements ICriteriaFilter, IInternshipSorter
Simple implementation of criteria-based filtering for internship opportunities.

This class provides straightforward filtering and sorting capabilities used primarily by Company Representatives and Career Center Staff. Unlike StudentEligibilityFilter, this implementation does NOT include student-specific eligibility checks, making it suitable for administrative and company-facing operations.

Implemented Interfaces

This class implements two interfaces, demonstrating Interface Segregation Principle (ISP):

  • ICriteriaFilter: Provides criteria-based filtering by level, major, status, and closing date
  • IInternshipSorter: Provides alphabetical sorting by title

Note: This class intentionally does NOT implement IStudentEligibilityFilter because Company Representatives and Staff don't need student-specific eligibility logic. This is a key benefit of ISP - classes implement only the interfaces they actually need.

Design Patterns and Principles

  • Strategy Pattern: This class implements filtering and sorting strategies that can be injected into InternshipManager through interface references
  • Dependency Inversion Principle (DIP): High-level components depend on the ICriteriaFilter and IInternshipSorter abstractions, not this concrete class
  • Open/Closed Principle: New filtering criteria can be added by extending this class without modifying existing code

Use Cases

  • Company Representatives filtering their own posted internships
  • Career Center Staff viewing and managing all internships by criteria
  • Administrative reports and bulk operations on internship data
  • Any scenario where user-agnostic filtering is needed

Filtering Behavior

Filtering uses a chain-of-responsibility approach where each criterion acts as a filter gate:

  • Level: Exact match (case-insensitive) on Basic/Intermediate/Advanced
  • Major: Exact match (case-insensitive) on preferred major
  • Status: Exact match (case-insensitive) on Open/Closed/etc.
  • Closing Date: Includes opportunities closing on or before the specified date

Empty or null criteria values are treated as "no filter" - they don't exclude any opportunities.

  • Constructor Details

    • CriteriaBasedFilter

      public CriteriaBasedFilter()

  • Method Details

    • applyFilter

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> applyFilter(List<InternshipOpportunity> list, FilterCriteria criteria)
      Applies multiple filter criteria to internship opportunities in a chain.

      This method processes the input list through a series of filter predicates, where each criterion (level, major, status, closing date) acts as a gate. An opportunity must pass all active filters to appear in the result.

      If the criteria object is null or contains no active filters (FilterCriteria.hasFilters() returns false), the original list is returned unchanged.

      Specified by:
      applyFilter in interface ICriteriaFilter
      Parameters:
      list - the list of internship opportunities to filter; must not be null
      criteria - the filtering criteria; if null or empty, no filtering is performed
      Returns:
      a filtered list containing opportunities matching all specified criteria
      See Also:
      • FilterCriteria
      • InternshipOpportunity

    • matchesLevel

      private boolean matchesLevel(InternshipOpportunity opp, String level)
      Checks if an opportunity matches the specified level filter.

      Performs case-insensitive comparison. If level is null or empty, returns true (no filtering on this criterion).

      Parameters:
      opp - the opportunity to check
      level - the level to match (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced); null or empty to skip this filter
      Returns:
      true if the opportunity matches the level or if no level filter is specified

    • matchesMajor

      private boolean matchesMajor(InternshipOpportunity opp, String major)
      Checks if an opportunity matches the specified major filter.

      Performs case-insensitive comparison on the preferred major. If major is null or empty, returns true (no filtering on this criterion).

      Parameters:
      opp - the opportunity to check
      major - the major to match; null or empty to skip this filter
      Returns:
      true if the opportunity's preferred major matches or if no major filter is specified

    • matchesStatus

      private boolean matchesStatus(InternshipOpportunity opp, String status)
      Checks if an opportunity matches the specified status filter.

      Performs case-insensitive comparison on the status. If status is null or empty, returns true (no filtering on this criterion).

      Parameters:
      opp - the opportunity to check
      status - the status to match (Open, Closed, etc.); null or empty to skip this filter
      Returns:
      true if the opportunity's status matches or if no status filter is specified

    • matchesClosingDate

      private boolean matchesClosingDate(InternshipOpportunity opp, LocalDate closingDate)
      Checks if an opportunity matches the specified closing date filter.

      Includes opportunities that close on or before the specified date. If closingDate is null, returns true (no filtering on this criterion).

      Parameters:
      opp - the opportunity to check
      closingDate - the maximum closing date; null to skip this filter
      Returns:
      true if the opportunity closes on or before the specified date, or if no date filter is specified

    • sortAlphabetically

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> sortAlphabetically(List<InternshipOpportunity> list)
      Sorts opportunities alphabetically by title in ascending order (case-insensitive).

      Creates a new sorted list; the original list is not modified. Uses case-insensitive comparison to provide natural alphabetical ordering.

      Specified by:
      sortAlphabetically in interface IInternshipSorter
      Parameters:
      list - the list of opportunities to sort; must not be null
      Returns:
      a new list containing the same opportunities sorted by title
      See Also:
      • InternshipOpportunity.getTitle()
